title: Knowledge Systems Design Expert Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis skills and specialized knowledge in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Education design optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning environments. Strengthens capabilities in building practice-oriented knowledge delivery systems

learning_goals: Students can apply a three-stage design framework for domain-specific knowledge system modeling
Students can design formative assessments using smartphone-based evaluation tools in constrained technological environments
Students can develop customized knowledge delivery systems for professionals using problem-based learning (PBL) approaches

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
